name: 100 Ping Pong Balls - 3 Mini Physics Games Of Catching Balls in a Cup - Classic, Reverse and Mixed
name_original: 100 Ping Pong Balls - 3 Mini Physics Games Of Catching Balls in a Cup - Classic, Reverse and Mixed
description:
100 Ping Pong Balls is a simple yet very addictive 1 touch game. The object is to release the ping pong balls into the cups without losing any along the way. You start with 100 balls and the game keeps going until you have 0 ping pong balls left or no cups to catch them in.

Drop them into different colored cups and the ping pong balls will change that color. Collect the colored ping pong balls for higher points.

Drop them in the rainbow colored cup and you will increase the number of balls in the cup. Drop in 5 balls to the rainbow colored cup and get an additional 5 balls added to the cup.

3 Gameplay Modes

* Classic Mode
* Reverse Mode
* Mixed Mode

This is an excellent physics game. Compare your score to others in Game Center.
